title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Second Language Writing Ability Development through Wiki-Based Collaborative Writing

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate second-language (English) proficiency and basic digital device literacy
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively complete expository essays in social studies using wiki platforms.

Learners incorporate at least three feedbacks received from peers and instructors during collaborative writing to improve the content quality of a second language writing task to an 'excellent' rating or higher in four out of five rubric items and enhance linguistic accuracy to an error rate of 10% or lower.
Learners can devise logical organization reflecting diverse perspectives through peer interaction.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
